short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a combo meter while you type! Track your typing streaks and see how many keys you hit in a row.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Combo Meter is a simple Chrome extension that tracks your typing streaks as you type. Whether you're writing an email, coding, or just chatting, the combo meter counts your keystrokes and shows how long your streak lasts. It's lightweight, fun, and designed to motivate you to keep typing!

Features:
- Displays a real-time combo meter as you type
- Fun and motivating way to engage with websites
